sentences.en: Barium as barite ( barium sulfate ) is used industrially as a white pigment for paint.
sentences.cn: 钡以重晶石形态 ( 硫酸钡 ) 在工业上用作油漆的白色涂料.

sentences.en: Certain colors, due to pigment ingredients, may inherently have very poor sulfuric acid resistance.
sentences.cn: 某些颜料, 由于色素组成成份的性质而导致耐酸性很差.

sentences.en: Certain pigment colours were painted on to dry plaster using tempera (where egg yolk is used to fix the pigment).
sentences.cn: 使用蛋彩画颜料（内含可以定色的蛋黄）在干石膏上绘出了特定颜色。

sentences.en: Dynacolour is the pigment powder and pigment paste colour preparations producer.
sentences.cn: 迪诺颜料是颜料和色浆的专业生产者.

sentences.en: He makes his own paint, grinding up the pigment with a little oil.
sentences.cn: 他就着几滴油磨了些颜料，自己制油彩。

sentences.en: Inside these melanocytes the formation of pigment granules takes place.
sentences.cn: 在黑色素细胞内部有细小的色素颗粒构成.

sentences.en: It is characteristic of small cell and low pigment.
sentences.cn: 它是一种小细胞低色素性贫血.

sentences.en: Mainiy use: Used to produce dyestuff, pigment, Surface active agent, Pharmaceutical material.
sentences.cn: 主要用途: 本品主要用作染料 、 颜料 、 表面活性剂, 医药合成的中间体.

sentences.en: Melanin is the dark brown pigment of the hair, skin and eyes.
sentences.cn: 黑色素是头发、皮肤以及眼睛中的深棕色色素。

sentences.en: Mulberry red pigment hence was a good kind of natural radical scavenger.
sentences.cn: 桑椹红色素是一种很好的天然自由基清除剂.

sentences.en: Pigment of the burn on the face precipitates, how to eliminate?
sentences.cn: 脸上烧伤色素沉淀, 怎么消除?

sentences.en: Similarly, any pigment nevus that is chronically irritated should be excised.
sentences.cn: 同样, 凡是经常受慢性刺激的各种色素痣切勿予以切除.

sentences.en: The artist Sandy Lee uses natural pigments in her work.
sentences.cn: 画家桑迪·李在她的作品中使用天然颜料。

sentences.en: The inhibition ratio, could be achieved more than 93 % by the 0.01 % pigment addition.
sentences.cn: 天然萝卜红色素的抗氧化能力与同浓度的BHT相近, 0.01%的添加量即可达到93%以上的抑制率.

sentences.en: The photosynthetic pigment in bacteria is bacteriochlorophyll.
sentences.cn: 细菌光合作用的色素是细菌叶绿素.

sentences.en: To decrease the usage of white pigment because of possessing good opacity.
sentences.cn: 白色不透明可减少白色颜料使用量.

sentences.en: When highly purified, the red - absorbing form of the pigment is blue - green.
sentences.cn: 如果高度提纯, 这种色素的红光吸收型是蓝绿色的.

words.tran_cn: 染色；色素淀积；天然颜色

phrases.tran_cn: 珍珠光泽颜料；珠母涂料

trans.tran_en: a natural substance that makes skin, hair, plants etc a particular colour
